## UppercaseLetter type

Represents an uppercase letter (A-Z).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type UppercaseLetter = Chars<"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ">;
```
**References:** [Chars](./react.chars.md)
